## AnimationClip.tracks property

Gets all the tracks of this animation

**Signature:**

```typescript
get tracks(): Map<SceneNode, {
        poseTranslation: Vector3;
        poseRotation: Quaternion;
        poseScaling: Vector3;
        tracks: AnimationTrack[];
    }>;
```
